name: Lei Mingxuan

workplace.street_number: Shop A-208 on the 2nd floor of a shopping mall

family: Unmarried, living with parents at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai.
hobbies: Collect trendy blind box toys (Pop Mart)
memory_date: 2012-07-01: Got the first job and officially entered society.
2020-05-20: Commemorative day of opening my own clothing store
aim: Short-term goal: Complete a deep self-driving tour of western Sichuan within six months to explore lesser-known natural landscapes.
Medium-term Goal: Upgrade existing stores into small-scale brand collection shops and establish online branches within three years.
Life Goal: Develop a habit of exercising regularly at least three times a week within five years, and maintain BMI within a healthy range.
healthy_desc: Subjectively, I feel very healthy with no documented history of chronic illnesses or long-term health issues. I engage in daily physical exercise (such as running) and spend time outdoors almost every day, maintaining a relatively good physical fitness foundation, though I am slightly overweight (BMI 27.04). My past medical checkup records are unclear, and I visit doctors infrequently. Overall, I am a health-conscious individual who prioritizes maintaining vitality through regular daily exercise.
lifestyle_desc: The lifestyle is active with a focus on socializing and leisure. Daily routines include browsing the internet for information, reading books and newspapers, listening to music at home, and engaging in physical exercise (such as running). Social life is rich, with gatherings with friends several times a week and meetings with relatives who do not live together, as well as shopping trips, several times a month. Outdoor activities (such as rollerblading and hiking) are highly enjoyed and engaged in almost daily. Information is primarily obtained through the internet. Over the past year, there have been more than 30 nights spent away from home for vacations or visiting relatives, reflecting a lifestyle that enjoys travel and exploration, although long-haul flights are relatively infrequent. During daily leisure time, social visits, relaxation, and self-improvement through learning are common activities.
economic_desc: Annual personal income is 150,000 yuan, living with parents, with a total household annual income of approximately 200,000 yuan (including income from a personal shop and partial retirement pensions of the parents). Household assets include three properties (one for self-occupation, the others rented out) and a family car. Investment activities are relatively conservative, currently focusing mainly on fund investments. Spending habits prioritize life experiences, with frequent expenditures on social activities, shopping, and travel. Overall, the financial situation is stable, with a certain level of asset accumulation and financial awareness.
work_desc: Currently, I am the owner of my own clothing store (sole proprietorship), which is self-employed in nature, with no other part-time jobs. I work up to 56 hours per week, with a high level of work engagement. My work primarily involves commercial sales and services, and I do not hold any administrative positions. The workplace is located in a shopping mall in Shanghai's Pudong New Area. Details such as commuting time, physical/mental workload, and schedule arrangements are unspecified, but I have autonomy over my current work status (as the owner). My first job began in 2012, working as a commercial and service industry employee, where I was employed by others at the time.
experience_desc: Lei Mingxuan is a native of Shanghai's Pudong district, where he has maintained his household registration and residence since birth. In 2008, he enrolled in a vocational college to study marketing. After graduating in 2012, his first job was as a salesperson at a local clothing store, where he gained extensive experience in sales techniques and customer service. During his employment, he keenly observed market trends and gradually built relationships with suppliers. In 2020, leveraging the resources he had accumulated and his insights into fashion, he opened his own clothing store in a shopping mall in Pudong New Area, successfully transitioning from an employee to a business owner. This entrepreneurial journey marked a significant milestone in his life. He remains unmarried and lives with his parents, dedicating most of his energy to managing his store and pursuing personal interests. His life trajectory has always been rooted in Shanghai, and he possesses a deep understanding of the local business environment and culture.
description:
Lei Mingxuan, a 31-year-old local male from Shanghai's Pudong district, holds a college diploma and currently runs his own clothing store, earning an annual income of approximately 150,000 yuan. He stands 172 cm tall, weighs 80 kg, and has a slightly stout build but is energetic, claiming to be in good health with a daily exercise routine. Unmarried, he lives with his parents. His family owns three properties and a car, indicating stable financial conditions.  

In terms of personality, he exhibits an ESTP (Entrepreneur) type—outgoing, pragmatic, action-oriented, and freedom-loving, with a strong pursuit of novelty and excitement. His values prioritize freedom and independence. His life is full and active, with a wide range of hobbies including playing billiards, rollerblading, watching anime, reading historical novels, running, collecting blind boxes, and making handmade soap. He frequently socializes with friends multiple times a week, maintaining an active social circle. He engages in outdoor activities almost daily and has a deep love for nature, dedicating significant time each year to vacations and visiting relatives.  

At work, as the store owner, he puts in 56 hours per week, handling tasks personally. Key dates in his life include starting his first job in 2012 and opening his store in 2020. His future goals include completing a self-drive tour of Western Sichuan, upgrading his store’s brand, and developing a regular fitness habit.  

Overall, Lei Mingxuan is a young, self-employed entrepreneur rooted in Shanghai, adept at seizing opportunities, enjoying life, and embodying an entrepreneurial spirit. His life seamlessly blends pragmatic business management with vibrant personal exploration.

relation.name: Lei Jianguo
relation.organization: Former state-owned machinery factory in Shanghai.
relation.relation_description: Lei Mingxuan's father was a senior technical worker at a state-owned factory before retirement, known for his rigorous and pragmatic approach to work. The father and son live together, and their daily conversations often revolve around family matters, shop operations, and current affairs. Lei Jianguo has a calm and steady personality, serving as the backbone of the family. Although he doesn’t fully understand some of his son’s modern hobbies, such as collecting blind boxes, he strongly supports his career. The two share dinner at home several times a week and sometimes go to the market or take walks in the park on weekends. Occasionally, Lei Jianguo visits his son’s shop to help out. Having witnessed his son’s journey from working for others to starting his own business, he is Lei Mingxuan’s most steadfast supporter.

relation.name: Wang Xiuying
relation.organization: Former Primary School in Pudong New Area
relation.relation_description: Lei Mingxuan's mother was a primary school Chinese language teacher before retirement. She is warm-hearted, family-oriented, and places great emphasis on family atmosphere and her son's daily life. She is an excellent cook, especially skilled at making the local-style braised pork that her son loves. Wang Xiuying shares a close relationship with her son and is one of the people Lei Mingxuan confides in. Although she sometimes worries about her son's busy work schedule and frequent social activities, she is mostly proud of him. The mother and son chat every day, discussing everything from the shop's business to family matters. Wang Xiuying occasionally helps organize goods at her son's shop and reminds him to take care of his health and settle down soon. She and Lei Jianguo are a typical complementary couple, working together to create a stable and warm environment for their family.

relation.name: Zhang Wei

home_address.street_number: A certain building in Biyun International Community.

relation.organization: Shanghai Branch of a Well-known Fast-Moving Consumer Goods Company
relation.relation_description: Zhang Wei and Lei Mingxuan were childhood neighbors who grew up in the same old alley in Pudong, attending the same primary and middle school. Their personalities complement each other—Zhang Wei is more steady and family-oriented, while Lei Mingxuan is more adventurous. As adults, Zhang Wei joined a company to work in marketing, while Lei Mingxuan opened his own shop, but they have always kept in close contact. Both now live in Shanghai, not far from each other, and meet approximately every two weeks for a meal or a game of billiards. They often share interesting life updates and industry information in their WeChat group. During holidays, the two families (Zhang Wei is married with a child) sometimes get together for meals as well.

relation.name: Li Na

home_address.street_number: Apartments near a certain technology park

relation.organization: A leading e-commerce platform
relation.relation_description: Li Na is a childhood friend shared by Lei Mingxuan and Zhang Wei, who was quite a tomboy in her younger days. She attended university in Hangzhou and stayed there after graduation to pursue a career in the local internet industry. Although separated by the distance between Shanghai and Hangzhou, the three of them maintain a WeChat group named "Pudong Three Musketeers," where they chat almost daily. Li Na, with her cheerful personality, is the life of the group. They meet at least twice a year, usually when Li Na returns to Shanghai or when Lei Mingxuan and Zhang Wei visit Hangzhou. During these gatherings, they reminisce about their childhood, discuss work, relationships, and share interesting stories from their respective cities. Their frequent online communication is complemented by offline meetings filled with anticipation and joy.

relation.name: Chen Hao
relation.organization: A well-known internet company in Hangzhou
relation.relation_description: Chen Hao is a high school classmate of Lei Mingxuan. They became acquainted while attending a middle school in Pudong because they both enjoyed playing basketball. After graduating from high school, Chen Hao was admitted to a university in Hangzhou and remained there for his career. He currently works as a product manager at an internet company. Despite living in different cities, the two have maintained a good relationship, primarily keeping in touch through WeChat. They arrange to play online games (such as Honor of Kings) several times a year, catching up on each other's lives and sharing industry gossip. Whenever Lei Mingxuan travels to Hangzhou for business or Chen Hao returns to Shanghai to visit family, they make sure to meet up for a meal, often choosing hotpot or local Shanghainese restaurants. During these gatherings, they reminisce about high school memories and discuss their respective career developments. Together with another high school classmate, Liu Yang, they have a three-person WeChat group where they occasionally share updates about their lives or plan visits to their alma mater.

relation.name: Liu Yang
relation.organization: A certain game company in Shenzhen
relation.relation_description: Liu Yang is a high school classmate of Lei Mingxuan and Chen Hao, and the three were once teammates on the basketball team. Liu Yang is relatively introverted but has an active mind. He chose to major in computer science in university and, after graduation, moved south to Shenzhen to enter the gaming industry. He is currently a senior development engineer specializing in game engine optimization. Due to his busy schedule and the distance, Liu Yang does not communicate with Lei Mingxuan as frequently as he does with Chen Hao, typically exchanging messages or calls via WeChat about once every quarter. Their conversations often revolve around technology trends, new anime releases, and collectible trendy toys. When Lei Mingxuan’s clothing store occasionally stocks game IP collaboration items, he consults Liu Yang for his opinion. If all three of them return to Shanghai during the Chinese New Year, they organize a small gathering of high school classmates, usually arranged by Lei Mingxuan, who picks the location. Whenever Liu Yang returns to Shanghai, he often visits Lei Mingxuan’s store to see what new items are available.

relation.name: Wang Lei

home_address.street_number: Room 302, Building 8, Jialvyuan Residential Area No. 456

relation.organization: A well-known e-commerce company in Hangzhou
relation.relation_description: Wang Lei is a university classmate of Lei Mingxuan. Both entered the marketing program in 2008 and became close friends through participating in student union activities and basketball matches during their college years. After graduation, Wang Lei chose to stay in Hangzhou to pursue his career, entering the internet industry. He currently works as a product manager at an e-commerce company. Although they live in different cities, their friendship has remained strong. They mainly stay in touch through WeChat, chatting casually once or twice a week on average, sharing industry updates, amusing life stories, or venting about work stress. Whenever Lei Mingxuan travels to Hangzhou for business or Wang Lei returns to Shanghai to visit family, they make sure to meet up. They usually choose an authentic local Shanghainese restaurant or a Japanese eatery for a meal, followed by a game of pool or a quiet bar to catch up over drinks and reminisce about their college days. Wang Lei is quick-witted and goal-oriented, often offering suggestions to Lei Mingxuan on the digitalization and online operations of his store.

relation.name: Zhao Min

home_address.street_number: No. 601, Building 15, Vanke Holiday Scenery Community, Lane 3333

relation.organization: A certain international exhibition company in Shanghai
relation.relation_description: Zhao Min is a university classmate of Lei Mingxuan and Wang Lei, and the three belong to a close-knit circle of friends. She is cheerful and enthusiastic, having served as the class cultural and arts commissioner during their university years. After graduation, Zhao Min chose to develop her career in Shanghai and currently works as a market planner for an exhibition company. Living in the same city as Lei Mingxuan, they stay in frequent contact, meeting up for meals or participating in offline activities—such as visiting art exhibitions, watching plays, or trying out newly opened trendy restaurants—approximately every two weeks. Zhao Min is a regular customer and "fashion consultant" at Lei Mingxuan's clothing store. She often visits the shop to browse and offer suggestions on style selections, and she also introduces her friends to shop there. She maintains contact with Wang Lei as well, and the three have a WeChat group where they frequently share funny anecdotes, travel photos, and plan at least one annual gathering, usually taking advantage of short holidays for a brief trip together. Zhao Min's creativity and extensive network of contacts often bring new inspiration and customers to Lei Mingxuan's store.

relation.name: Sun Yue
relation.occupation: Regional Operations Manager for Apparel Brand
relation.organization: A well-known domestic fast fashion brand company
relation.relation_description: Sun Yue was Lei Mingxuan's colleague from 2012 to 2015 at a local clothing chain store in Shanghai, where both were part of the sales team. Outgoing and enthusiastic, she excelled at communication and was the store's top salesperson at the time, providing considerable help and encouragement to Lei Mingxuan, who was just starting his career. At the end of 2015, Sun Yue chose to resign for personal development and returned to her hometown, Hangzhou, where she quickly advanced in the fast-fashion industry due to her outstanding abilities. Although they live in different cities, they have maintained contact through WeChat, occasionally exchanging industry updates and insights on store management. Whenever Lei Mingxuan visits Hangzhou or Sun Yue travels to Shanghai for work, they make time to meet for a meal if their schedules allow, typically once or twice a year. They usually choose distinctive restaurants to catch up on each other's lives and work over a meal. Online communication is irregular, mainly consisting of interactions on social media and holiday greetings.

relation.name: Zhou Tao
relation.organization: Hangzhou Taosheng Garments Co., Ltd.
relation.relation_description: Zhou Tao is one of the main fabric suppliers for Lei Mingxuan's clothing store. The two met at an industry exhibition in 2019. Zhou Tao's company is based in Hangzhou and primarily engages in fast-fashion fabric wholesale across the Jiangsu, Zhejiang, and Shanghai regions. He is astute, capable, and possesses a sharp business acumen. Lei Mingxuan appreciates the stable quality and innovative designs of the fabrics he provides, which meet the store's demand for trendy styles. The two mainly communicate via WeChat and phone calls, discussing orders, new products, and industry trends once or twice a week on average. Lei Mingxuan travels to Hangzhou once or twice a year to attend ordering meetings or inspect factories, during which he meets with Zhou Tao. Apart from business discussions, they also dine together and exchange market insights. Due to their geographical separation, their collaboration is primarily conducted online. However, they have built a solid business partnership based on mutual trust.

relation.name: Wu Fang
relation.organization: Guangzhou Fanghua Accessories Trading Firm
relation.relation_description: Wu Fang is the supplier of accessories and trendy items for Lei Mingxuan's store. They established their partnership in 2021 through an introduction from a fellow industry professional. Wu Fang runs her own accessory trading business in Guangzhou, with a wide range of sourcing channels. She excels in discovering works from niche designers and sourcing surplus export goods. Known for her warm and attentive personality, Wu Fang provides meticulous service and always recommends suitable accessories based on Lei Mingxuan’s store style. The two communicate almost entirely online, using WeChat video calls to view products, place orders, and settle payments, with interactions occurring several times a month. Occasionally, when Lei Mingxuan travels to Guangzhou for events like the Canton Fair or to explore wholesale markets, she visits Wu Fang’s stall. They enjoy morning tea together and exchange insights on the latest fashion trends. Despite being based in Shanghai and Guangzhou respectively, their efficient online collaboration model has maintained a close business relationship. Wu Fang also frequently sends Lei Mingxuan samples of new products.

relation.name: Zheng Kai
relation.organization: Century Link Mall Property Management Department
relation.relation_description: Zheng Kai is the property manager of the shopping mall where Lei Mingxuan's store is located, responsible for the daily management of the floor and coordination among merchants. The two have known each other since Lei Mingxuan's store opened in 2020. Zheng Kai is meticulous and principled in his work but also reasonable, having provided Lei Mingxuan with considerable assistance in areas such as store renovation, daily operations, and promotional activity reporting. Due to sharing the same workplace, they meet almost daily in the mall, often exchanging brief updates on mall developments or engaging in casual conversation. Once a month, they have a more formal discussion regarding rent, property fees, or the mall's unified event arrangements. Privately, as both are locals of Shanghai and around the same age, they sometimes meet for a simple meal or coffee near the mall after work, maintaining a relationship that lies somewhere between professional colleagues and casual friends. Zheng Kai is also familiar with other merchants in the mall and occasionally organizes small-scale merchant gatherings, which Lei Mingxuan also attends.

relation.name: Money Duoduo
relation.organization: A well-known MCN agency
relation.relation_description: Qian Duoduo is a regular customer at Lei Mingxuan's clothing store. About three years ago, she stumbled into the shop while shopping at the mall and was captivated by its unique selection of items. With a lively and outgoing personality, she enjoys experimenting with trendy outfits and is a typical ENFP type. The two became close due to their shared interest in fashion and trendy collectibles. Every time Qian Duoduo visits the store, she not only shops but also often exchanges the latest fashion trends and anime updates with Lei Mingxuan. She currently lives and works in Shanghai's Jing'an District, where she works as a new media operations manager with a good income and strong purchasing power. Nowadays, they mainly stay in touch via WeChat. Qian Duoduo keeps an eye on the store's new arrivals through its WeChat Moments and visits the shop once or twice a month on average. Sometimes, she also invites other trendy collectible enthusiasts they both know to shop and chat together.

relation.name: Feng Xiaoyu

home_address.street_number: Room 301, Building 12, a certain residential community

relation.organization: A German-funded automotive parts company, Suzhou Branch
relation.relation_description: Feng Xiaoyu is a long-time customer who has known Lei Mingxuan since the early days of his store. They first met when she was purchasing event gifts for her company. Gentle and meticulous by nature, she has an ISFJ personality and is highly organized in her work. Although she resides in the Suzhou Industrial Park and works in Shanghai, she frequently travels between the two cities due to business needs. She appreciates the quality of the goods in Lei Mingxuan’s store and the owner’s pragmatic style, so she not only shops there herself but also often recommends the store to colleagues and friends. Their relationship has transcended a simple buyer-seller dynamic and resembles more of a friendship, with occasional exchanges about work and daily life. Feng Xiaoyu also knows Qian Duoduo, and sometimes the three of them meet at Lei Mingxuan’s store. Nowadays, they mainly stay in touch through WeChat and phone calls. Whenever Feng Xiaoyu travels to Shanghai for business, she always makes time to visit the store, typically once or twice a quarter, while maintaining their connection online at other times.

relation.name: Han Dong
relation.organization: Tuhu Auto Maintenance Workshop Store (Minhang Store)
relation.relation_description: Han Dong is a billiards partner whom Lei Mingxuan met at the pool hall. They became friends due to their comparable skills and straightforward personalities. They met three years ago and usually arrange to play one or two matches per week at the pool hall, chatting about cars, anime, and recent business ventures while playing. Han Dong is Lei Mingxuan's regular "practice opponent," and they occasionally meet up for late-night snacks, typically hotpot or barbecue. Both live in Shanghai, but one resides in Pudong while the other is in Minhang. Apart from playing billiards and occasional meals, they mainly communicate online via WeChat to share match updates and interesting short videos.

relation.name: Qin Lang
relation.organization: Alibaba Group
relation.relation_description: Qin Lang is another billiards expert whom Lei Mingxuan met through Han Dong's introduction. The three of them often form a small circle to play together. Qin Lang works for an internet company in Hangzhou but travels to Shanghai once or twice a month for business or to visit family. Every time he comes to Shanghai, he makes sure to arrange a game with Lei Mingxuan and Han Dong. They have known each other for two years, and their relationship lies somewhere between friends and fellow players. When they meet, besides honing their skills, Qin Lang shares insights from the internet industry, while Lei Mingxuan talks about interesting experiences from running his physical store. Due to living in different cities, their daily communication mainly takes place in a WeChat group, where they share videos of billiards matches, discuss newly released trendy toys, and plan the next "Shanghai-Hangzhou Billiards Challenge."

relation.name: Song Jia
relation.organization: A certain advertising creative company in Shanghai
relation.relation_description: Song Jia is a friend whom Lei Mingxuan met at the Pudong Riverside Rollerblading Track. They got to know each other about three years ago through rollerblading skill exchanges. She is cheerful and enthusiastic, an active member of the rollerblading community who often organizes weekend rollerblading events. Their interactions are relaxed and casual, often connecting over rollerblading activities, newly opened restaurants, or interesting markets. When they meet, they usually rollerblade together, have meals, or explore trendy shops. Currently, both live in Shanghai but reside in Pudong and Minhang, respectively. They now primarily stay in touch via WeChat, sharing interesting moments from their lives and rollerblading videos. On average, they chat online a few times a week and meet up for rollerblading or gatherings once or twice a month.

relation.name: Xie Fei
relation.organization: A Shanghai branch of an internet technology company.
relation.relation_description: Xie Fei is a basketball buddy whom Lei Mingxuan met at the community basketball court, and they have known each other for three years. Their friendship was forged through a shared passion for basketball. Every Wednesday evening and Saturday afternoon, they meet at the outdoor court of Yuanshen Sports Center in Pudong to play. After the game, they often head to nearby barbecue joints or noodle shops for late-night snacks, chatting about work and life. Xie Fei is outgoing and enthusiastic, often serving as the life of the party on the court. He currently works in Shanghai and lives in the same city as Lei Mingxuan, making it very convenient for them to meet in person. Besides playing basketball, they occasionally share interesting basketball videos or discuss NBA games on WeChat. They are purely sports partners who enjoy each other's company.

relation.name: Gao Yuan

home_address.street_number: Room 502, Building 3, No. 456 Cuiyuan Residential Area

relation.organization: Hangzhou Certain Network Technology Co., Ltd.
relation.relation_description: Gao Yuan is an online acquaintance of Lei Mingxuan from an anime forum, and the two became close through in-depth discussions about the same niche anime series. They primarily communicate online via QQ groups and Bilibili updates, sharing information about new anime releases and exchanging tips on figure collecting. Occasionally, they also watch new anime premieres together through voice calls. Gao Yuan works in the gaming industry in Hangzhou, while Lei Mingxuan runs a clothing store in Shanghai. Despite living in different cities and working in different fields, their shared passion for anime has allowed them to maintain a stable online friendship. They interact online two to three times a week on average, and during peak anime convention seasons—such as Comicup in the summer or Bilibili Macro Link during the National Day holiday—they might arrange to meet in Shanghai or Hangzhou if their schedules align, exploring conventions and shopping together. Gao Yuan is introverted and rational by nature, known in the community as a "lore enthusiast," often providing Lei Mingxuan with background knowledge for his collections.

relation.name: Lin Jing
relation.organization: An internet technology company
relation.relation_description: Lin Jing is a fellow collector whom Lei Mingxuan met in an online trendy toy community, bonding over their shared passion for collecting Pop Mart series. They got acquainted in 2021 and primarily communicate through WeChat groups and second-hand trading platforms to exchange information about collectibles and market trends. Occasionally, they help each other with purchasing or swapping rare editions. Although one runs a physical store in Shanghai while the other works as an internet designer in Shenzhen, living in different cities, both share a deep enthusiasm for this hobby. They chat online once or twice a week on average, sharing updates about new releases or showcasing their collections. When Lei Mingxuan attended an exhibition in Guangzhou, he met Lin Jing and two other enthusiasts in person. They spent time exploring the exhibition together, had meals, and exchanged collecting insights. Currently, they maintain their connection mainly through online channels and plan to attend large-scale trendy toy exhibitions as a group in the future when opportunities arise.

relation.name: Xu Feng
relation.organization: Huatai Securities Shanghai Branch
relation.relation_description: Xu Feng is a fund manager whom Lei Mingxuan met in 2021 through a friend’s introduction, at a time when Lei was considering investing part of his savings. Professional, composed, and skilled in market analysis, Xu Feng designed a relatively stable fund portfolio for Lei Mingxuan. When they spend time together, Xu Feng often shares the latest financial news and market insights, while Lei Mingxuan tends to steer conversations toward daily anecdotes and store management. Both currently live in Shanghai, but one resides in Pudong and the other in Xuhui. They connect about once a month, primarily via WeChat to discuss investment matters. Occasionally, they meet at a café in Xuhui, sipping coffee while talking about finances and catching up on each other’s lives, in a rational and relaxed atmosphere.

relation.name: He Zhiqiang
relation.organization: Zhiqiang Auto Maintenance Center
relation.relation_description: He Zhiqiang is the owner of the car maintenance center that Lei Mingxuan frequents. The two met three years ago through vehicle servicing. With solid technical skills and a down-to-earth personality, Master He earned Lei Mingxuan’s appreciation for his professionalism and integrity, gradually evolving their relationship from client to friend. They usually get in touch for vehicle issues or maintenance needs, and occasionally share a casual meal near Lei Mingxuan’s shop, chatting about business and cars. Both live in Shanghai but in different districts—Pudong and Minhang—so they meet roughly once every quarter, primarily for business with some social interaction. Some of Lei Mingxuan’s friends have also had their cars repaired by Master He, through which he has come to know several of Lei Mingxuan’s golf buddies.

relation.name: Zhu Xiuying
relation.organization: A primary school in Pudong New District (retired)
relation.relation_description: Auntie Zhu is a long-time neighbor of Lei Mingxuan's family, living in the same alley. She watched Lei Mingxuan grow up, and they share a close relationship. When Lei Mingxuan's parents were busy with work, Auntie Zhu used to help take care of him. Now retired, Auntie Zhu leads a leisurely life and often chats with neighbors at the entrance of the alley or in the community garden. When Lei Mingxuan returns from work or goes out on weekends, he often runs into her and stops to exchange a few words, discussing the weather, community news, or the flowers and plants she grows. Occasionally, when Auntie Zhu makes Ningbo-style snacks, such as glutinous rice balls in fermented rice, she brings a bowl to the Lei family. They maintain a warm, everyday neighborly bond, with frequent interactions—almost daily greetings—making them a stable and familiar presence in the community life.

relation.name: Yang Fan

home_address.street_number: No. 588 Future Technology City Dream Town, Building E

relation.organization: A leading internet company
relation.relation_description: Yang Fan is the son of Lei Mingxuan's aunt. The two grew up together in Shanghai's Pudong district and have always been close. Yang Fan attended university in Hangzhou and, after graduation, stayed there to work in the local internet industry, becoming an algorithm engineer. Although they live in different cities, they maintain a strong bond, primarily keeping in touch through WeChat and phone calls, with an average of one video call per week to discuss work, life, and the latest tech gadgets. Whenever Lei Mingxuan travels to Hangzhou for business or leisure, he makes a point to meet up with Yang Fan. They often share meals, visit tech exhibitions, or play billiards together. Yang Fan, who is introverted and rational, serves as an important advisor to Lei Mingxuan on technical issues and investment strategies. Every Spring Festival, Yang Fan returns to Shanghai to celebrate the New Year, and the two always find time to reunite, catching up on the year's changes and sharing family anecdotes.

relation.name: Shen Jie
relation.organization: A Chinese subsidiary of an international fashion brand
relation.relation_description: Shen Jie is the daughter of Lei Mingxuan's uncle, making them cousins. She was also born and raised in Shanghai, studied fashion management in university, and currently works as a buyer for an international brand, with a keen eye for fashion trends. Since they both live in Shanghai and share a connection to the fashion industry, they stay in frequent contact, meeting on average once every two weeks. Shen Jie serves as an important "consultant" for Lei Mingxuan's clothing store, often providing him with styling suggestions and industry insights, while Lei Mingxuan also asks her to try on new arrivals. When they meet, they often explore new stores, visit exhibitions, go shopping, or gather with other friends for meals. Shen Jie has a lively and outgoing personality and is an active member of Lei Mingxuan's social circle. They also discuss family matters and personal relationships. During holiday family gatherings, they always sit together and are among the closest relatives of their generation.
